Types

TermTextConf = object
  nil

TermBuf = object
  buf: Seq2d[ColoredRune]
  xDiff: int
  yDiff: int

Consts

emptyTermBuf: TermBuf = (buf: (colWidth: 0, elems: []), xDiff: 0, yDiff: 0)

func toTermBufFast(str: string): TermBuf {...}{.raises: [ValueError, AssertionError],
                                       tags: [].}

Create new term buffer without checking for newlines.

WARN: use only when there is no newlines or escape sequences in input string, otherwise it will look like garbage in terminal.
